Code Club has **restarted for the 2025 Spring semester on January 14^th^** and
is being held on **Tuesdays from 4-5 pm** via Zoom and with in-person locations in Columbus and Wooster.

If you **[sign up using this Google form](https://forms.gle/eYkMvmJShrcANUrt5)**,
we will add you to our mailing list and keep you up-to-date!
(We have separate mailing lists for each semester, so please sign up again even if you've joined before.)

<hr style="height:1pt; visibility:hidden;" />

*For an overview of all previous Code Club sessions, including from previous semesters,* *see the [**Previous sessions page**](/pages/previous.qmd).*
:::
